thread.title: Agnieszka Roeskes new book Show In Time Transports a Young Woman to 17th Century Ireland, where She Finds Love and Longing with a Man who is Shrouded in Mystery.
thread.title_full: Agnieszka Roeskes new book Show In Time Transports a Young Woman to 17th Century Ireland, where She Finds Love and Longing with a Man who is Shrouded in Mystery. - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Agnieszka Roeskes new book Show In Time Transports a Young Woman to 17th Century Ireland, where She Finds Love and Longing with a Man who is Shrouded in Mystery.
text:
Recent release “Show In Time” from Page Publishing author Agnieszka Roeske is a fairy tale come true for beautiful Sylvia, who finds herself swept into the arms of an amazing mystery man.
(PRWEB) October 06, 2015
Agnieszka Roeske, a lifelong lover of words and mother of 4, has completed her new book “Show In Time”: a sensual and steamy romance set in both 17th century Ireland and modern time.
Agnieszka says that writing has always been, “...an escape from dark days in her life, it always gave [her] the feeling of freedom..”
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Agnieszka Roeske’s romantic story opens with a young and independent Sylvia being pulled into her favorite television program, and landing in the arms of her favorite leading man.
Sylvia finds herself being carried off to a castle and swept up into an unbelievable and erotic fairy tale story. But, now she needs to choose between her life as a doctor and a future with the only man she has ever loved.
Readers who wish to experience this sensual work can purchase “Show In Time” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13000529.htm
